comment.author: 34476140@N07
comment._content: This is the compartment where the parachute was located..the green bag actually contained the uprighting devices which inflated subsequent to splash down. The parachute (one of three) with its white deployment bag have not been installed in this image. I hold a complete parachute and its associated deployment bag in my collection..images can be seen on my website (URL www.SPACEAHOLIC.com/ . Great image though....got any others?

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/34476140@N07] We might!  You can search of photo stream under "Apollo" and "Parachute" and see what you find!
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
